articles.description: The Rajasthan seamer has seldom got his due credits, despite nailing Kohli seven times, Rohit five and Gayle four.
articles.content: Sandeep Sharma, the Rajasthan Royals seamer, operates in anonymity. He doesnt own the strapping built of a pace bowler, he has often turned up for unglamorous sides like Punjab Kings, Sunrisers Hyder… [+6446 chars]

articles.author: Ritam
articles.title: [Watch] Virat Kohli Walks With Swagger Like Tollywood's Ram Charan On His Way To Hyderabad - OneCricket
articles.description: With Royal Challengers Bengaluru (RCB) finding themselves at the bottom of the IPL 2024 points table, Virat Kohli is not having a great time lately. Even though he has the Orange Cap with 379 runs across eight matches at an average of 150.40.
articles.content:
